original_text: You can live in a way that is good and right. You can do this all your lives.” ’ 1: Zechariah's song shows how happy he is. God has been good to him and to Elizabeth. God has shown him how important John will be. Zechariah thanks God. He tells the people that God is great. You can live in a way that is good and right.
korean_text: 종신토록 주의 앞에서 성결과 의로 두려움이 없이 섬기게 하리라 하셨도다

sentences.original_text: You can live in a way that is good and right.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 선하고 올바른 방식으로 살 수 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: You can do this all your lives.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 평생 동안 이렇게 할 수 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: Zechariah's song shows how happy he is.
sentences.korean_translation: 스가랴의 노래는 그가 얼마나 행복한지를 보여줍니다.

sentences.original_text: God has been good to him and to Elizabeth.
God has shown him how important John will be.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 요한이 얼마나 중요할지를 그에게 보여주셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: He tells the people that God is great.
You can live in a way that is good and right.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 선하고 올바른 방식으로 살 수 있습니다.
